Member Data Documentation

bool ldmx::BiasingMessenger::biasingEnabled_ [static, private]

Directory containing all biasing commands. Command enabling biasing. Command allowing a user to specify what particle type to bias. Command allowing a user to specify what process to bias. Command allowing a user to specify an energy threshold. Command allowing a user to specify what volume the biasing should be attached to. Command allowing a user to specify by what factor the xsec of the process will be increased. Flag indicating if biasing is enabled
